preqs: MCB2011. Alternatively, for students who have completed MOL2011, please consult with the Unit Co-ordinator.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MCB2011}

proh: MOL2022. Please consult with the Unit Co-ordinator for exceptions.
description: In this unit students will study the cell as a dynamic unit capable of responding to environmental, cellular and molecular cues that can result in a range of outcomes such as: motility; movement or rearrangement of internal structures; alterations in the production, processing or disposal of oligonucleotides, proteins and organelles; repair of damaged components; assembly and disassembly of molecular machinery or communication pathways; switching genetic pathways on or off; and changes in cell proliferation, lifespan, function, or interactions with other cells.
